20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Abdul-Malik bin Abi Sulaiman reported from Zubaid, from Sa'eed bin Abdur-Rahman bin Abza, from his father, who said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite in witr: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High;" and "Say: O you disbelievers!;' and 'Say: He is Allah, (the) One

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى شُعْبَةَ فِيهِ . أ }
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the differences reported from Shu'bah about that report
